user.title: Combivox Amica Web
user.description: Enter the connection details for your Combivox Amica alarm panel.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the alarm panel

init.title: Integration Options
init.description: Configure PIN codes, scenarios and arm modes.

data_description.code: Master PIN code for arm/disarm operations
data_description.tech_code: Technical PIN code for advanced operations
data_description.macro_away: Select a scenario to activate when arming away, or leave empty to use areas instead (if both are configured, areas have priority)
data_description.areas_away: Select areas to arm when arming away
data_description.arm_mode_away: Select arming mode for away (normal with exit delay, immediate, or forced bypassing open zones)
data_description.macro_home: Select a scenario to activate when arming home, or leave empty to use areas instead (if both are configured, areas have priority)
data_description.areas_home: Select areas to arm when arming home
data_description.arm_mode_home: Select arming mode for home (normal with exit delay, immediate, or forced bypassing open zones)
data_description.macro_night: Select a scenario to activate when arming night, or leave empty to use areas instead (if both are configured, areas have priority)
data_description.areas_night: Select areas to arm when arming night
data_description.arm_mode_night: Select arming mode for night (normal with exit delay, immediate, or forced bypassing open zones)
data_description.macro_disarm: Select a scenario to activate when disarming, or leave empty to use areas instead (if both are configured, areas have priority)
data_description.areas_disarm: Select specific areas to disarm when disarming. If left empty, ALL areas will be disarmed (complete disarm)
data_description.scan_interval: Status polling interval in seconds (default: 5, recommended range: 3-20)
